Reference

All functions

ALA4R

ALA4R

ala_categories()

List valid options for a categorical field

ala_checklist()

List species matching criteria

ala_citation()

Generate a citation for occurrence data

ala_columns()

Build dataframe of columns to keep

ala_config() ala_reasons()

Get or set configuration options that control ALA4R behaviour

ala_counts()

Counts for ALA records

ala_data_profiles()

Data quality profiles

ala_fields()

Retrieves a list of all field names that can be used with data retrieval functions

ala_filters()

Build a dataframe from a filter list

ala_geometry()

Build a WKT string from a spatial object or verify an existing string.

ala_layers()

Search ALA spatial layers

ala_media()

Download images and sounds from the ALA.

ala_occurrences()

Download occurrence data from the ALA.

ala_quality_filters()

Get data filters for a data quality profile

ala_taxa()

Function to lookup species information from ALA, given names or unique identifiers.

exclude()

Negate a filter value
